game.description: A brave adventurer is needed to retrieve a lost artifact from a treacherous dungeon.
game.objective: Find the artifact and return it to the quest giver.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a powerful magic item

tasks.description: Explore the dark and dangerous dungeon.
tasks.objective: Search for clues and locate the hidden artifact.

tasks.description: Defeat the guardian monster guarding the artifact.
tasks.objective: Defeat the monster and take the artifact.

tasks.description: Escape from the collapsing dungeon and return to the quest giver.
tasks.objective: Avoid traps and make it out of the dungeon alive.

game.title: The Lost Artifact
